name: SuperSnake 97'
description:
SuperSnake97' is a remake of the well known good old snake.

---> New features, options, difficulty. Complete menu control.

---> Minimalist nice graphics and funky music. You can shut down sounds or music whenever you want. Flashy colors evolving during the game.

---> Different type of coins / wall to eat or avoid depending on options you chose, higher difficulty makes you earn points faster. So playing easier modes will not make you beat hightscores so much easier. It's a matter of choice.

---> Play gentle and relaxing or try to eat points faster with your skills and fast paced gameplay.

---> 5 Highscores registered

Game is avaible on Windows only, but Mac OS and Linux version may come.

Have fun and enjoy the game ! One or two bucks would be greatly appreciated if you liked the game !
